HiddenText.Name: Where can I find payroll notification information?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Where can I find payroll notification information?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Instructors can find information about payroll notification in one of two places. If the instructor is located in Utah or Idaho they can access their payroll notification through the BYU-Idaho Payroll Notification site by clicking on the following link: http://web.byui.edu/payroll/notify and entering their NetID and password. Instructors who are not living in Utah or Idaho are paid through CORT. For those employees, DMBA creates a DMBA ID number for each and BYU-Idaho human resources then sends them an email with specific instructions on how to review paystubs. Additional details will be posted here soon.
